name: The Ranger's Last Trail
description: You retrace Harlan Voss's final journey before he became a ghoul. His trail leads into the deep desert, where the truth about Jax's fate begins to surface.

stages.name: The Final Trail
stages.description: You've uncovered the Vault-Tec connection. Now you follow Harlan's last known path into the Mojave.

stages.name: Reach the Desert Ranger Camp
stages.description: Harlan's last log mentions a remote Ranger camp. Travel there.

stages.name: Search the Ranger Camp
stages.description: Search the abandoned camp for Harlan's final holotape.

stages.name: Play Harlan's Final Holotape
stages.description: Play the holotape to hear Harlan's last message before he vanished.

stages.name: Follow Harlan's Last Footsteps
stages.description: The holotape mentions a canyon where Harlan saw Jax's body being moved. Travel there.

stages.name: Investigate the Canyon
stages.description: Search the canyon for signs of what happened to Harlan.

stages.name: Read Harlan's Final Note
stages.description: Read the note Harlan left before he disappeared.

stages.name: Quest Complete
stages.description: You've retraced Harlan's final journey. The truth lies ahead.
